comment: Membership in a set of open intervals of extended reals. We use the fact that an operation's value is empty outside of its domain to show ` A e. RR* ` and ` B e. RR* ` . (Contributed by NM, 24-Dec-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-Nov-2013.)
